about_the_game:
Ah 'ate those flockin birds



It's you vs the Birds, how are you going to use your skills to deal with this. The Birds have you heavily out numbered, but luckily a not so close, close friend, has agreed to lend you a spaceship. Hurry, get there and show those annoying pesky little flying vermin. Who's Boss!

Demo Version

This demo - "I demo those flocking birds", is locked to repeating level 5, and does not include bonus stages and secrets.

Demo will reset back to game selection screen after 20 Minutes.

Retroa Retroa Builda



Challenge yourself to get through 20 levels of mayhem. Collecting items along the way, collect them all to open the exit. Be cautious of all the crazy enemy encounters, have you got the skills you'll need to complete, all the levels.

Demo Version

This demo Lets you play the first level of the game, "The obligatory annoying tutorial level". One user created level is open for you to create your own masterpiece. Some editing features maybe locked in demo version.

Demo will reset back to game selection screen after 20 Minutes.

Slime? Climb?



Use your block dropping skills, to help all slimes to climb up and reach the levels exit. Careful not to harm the little slimes as they all climb to freedom. Move and slam, blocks down , to give all slimes a boost up. How many levels, will you conquer.

Demo Version

This demo is locked to random levels game and a single NPC. You can choose to play simple or puzzle game.

Demo will reset back to game selection screen after 20 Minutes.

name: 3 Hit Blunders Bundle Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: AMD / INTEL
  • Memory: 50 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD / INTEL
  • Memory: 50 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU - NVIDIA / RADEON
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: .......... A collection of 80's retro inspired games ......... ....... Commodore64 / ZX 48K Spectrum/ Arcade ....... ... Ah 'ate those flockin birds - A 2d arcade shooter ... ... Retroa Retroa Builda - A 2d precision platformer ... ....... Slime? Climb? - A 2d puzzle block climber .........
